text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: A few days before tryouts...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's the weekend. I'm walking along<n>the riverbank when I
see Eishin Flash<n>training.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Break time.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It looks like she's training fairly<n>intensely. It's clear from
her strained<n>expression that she's fatigued.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Break time... over.
choice_data_list: (That was fast!)

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Huff... Next is—
choice_data_list: You should really take a longer break!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Huh? ...Who are you?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After introducing myself as an<n>academy trainer, I point out
that she<n>obviously needs more rest, but...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
No, I... I'm just fine. The short break<n>times are accounted
for in my<n>schedule.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
It's 3 p.m., and my fatigue is at<n>predicted levels. I plan to
catch my<n>breath during the thirty-minute break<n>coming up.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It sounds like her absolute confidence<n>in her schedule
won't allow her to<n>stray from it. But I wonder...
choice_data_list:
Let's say something unplanned for happens.
What then?

Let's say something unplanned for happens.
What then?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Of course, I have included a certain<n>amount of buffer time.
For example,<n>your talking to me has caused a delay<n>of
four minutes and twenty-five<n>seconds.
choice_data_list: Ah... Sorry about that.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
No, it's all right. If I scratch my next<n>five-minute break, I'll
be back on<n>schedule.
choice_data_list: You're gonna get rid of a break?!
You're gonna get rid of a break?!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
It's pushing my limits, I am aware. As<n>I have an immediate
goal to<n>accomplish, my current schedule is<n>tighter than
usual.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: And following it perfectly is my top<n>priority. If I don't, I...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
...It's been five minutes and forty-five<n>seconds. I can't
afford to lose any<n>more time, so please excuse me.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I forgot to say—I appreciate you<n>showing concern for me. I'll
be going<n>now.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Eishin Flash is determined to win her<n>race, no question.
However, it's<n>apparent she's so determined that<n>it's
stressing her out.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Tryouts are important, sure, but<n>they're held throughout the
year.<n>Could there be some reason why she<n>has to debut
now?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Why, hello there. ☆ Have time for a<n>quick chat?
choice_data_list: Oh! Uh, hey.
Oh! Uh, hey.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Flash is my roommate, you see. So I<n>know all about just
how hard she's<n>been training.
choice_data_list: Would you happen to know why as well?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Hehe. Of course! But keep all this off<n>the record, mkay?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
So for the upcoming tryouts, her<n>parents are apparently
coming all the<n>way from Germany to watch!
choice_data_list: Her parents?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Her family runs, like, a popular cake<n>shop, right? So they're
taking time out<n>of their super busy schedule to<n>visit—that's
why Flash is trying so<n>hard.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Well, that certainly answers why<n>she's going all out for this
race. But<n>even so, being so strict about her<n>schedule isn't
the only way to<n>improve.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: At any rate, that's just about all I can<n>say.
choice_data_list: Can I ask why you told me?
Can I ask why you told me?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Mmm, my Falco senses were just<n>telling me I should. ☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
When I saw the two of you talking, I<n>got this feeling—maybe
you'd be able<n>to understand how amazing she is. ☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
You're curious about Flash, aren't<n>you? Make sure you
keep your eyes<n>on her. ☆

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's now the day before tryouts, and<n>I'm mulling over what
exactly Smart<n>Falcon meant as I walk across<n>campus.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Toi, toi, toi...
choice_data_list: (What's that sound? And that voice, is that...)

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Ah... We met the other day.
choice_data_list: Were you making a noise just now?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: It's this German good luck charm my<n>parents taught me.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
You tap your desk three times while<n>chanting, "Toi, toi, toi."
The noise<n>wards off evil and brings good luck,<n>
supposedly.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I know it probably doesn't actually do<n>anything, but I want
to make sure<n>everything goes according to plan<n>tomorrow.
choice_data_list: Something got you worried?
Something got you worried?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
No, not exactly. It's just... my busy<n>parents have made time
to come<n>watch my race tomorrow.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I have to perform my job properly<n>and achieve perfect
results—it's my<n>duty, as their daughter.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
If something goes awry, and my<n>results are... lacking, they
won't have<n>much to be proud of.
choice_data_list: I don't know about that.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: What do you mean?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I can't pretend to know much about<n>her, much less her
parents, but just<n>seeing her run is enough to know<n>how
much effort she's put into this.
choice_data_list: Your hard work is something to be proud of.
Your hard work is something to be proud of.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
That... No, that's wrong. It makes light<n>of discipline and
reason—nothing but<n>empty flattery.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I've just noticed that something's<n>off with her. She's short
of breath,<n>and rather pale...
choice_data_list: Are you feeling all right?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
My schedule may have pushed me a<n>little past my limits,
but I did all I<n>needed to to improve.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Slight discomfort like this is within my<n>margin of error.
Besides, today is a<n>rest day. I'll be fully recovered by<n>
tomorrow.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
There's no power in her voice, much<n>less conviction. I can't
imagine her<n>bouncing back so soon.
choice_data_list:
Might want to consider taking tomorrow off
too...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: No, absolutely not!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I have no plans to take tomorrow off.<n>I've worked hard to
win my race—to<n>achieve the perfect results!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I can't deviate from my schedule<n>now—I do things as
planned until<n>they're finished. Or else... or... else...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Thud.
choice_data_list: Flash!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Everything will be... thrown off...
